events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days and I'm getting worried.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to mentions of a late shipment and tracking problems.
Your case has been assigned to one of our delivery support agents who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your concern about the delay in your shipment and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the last tracking update you received so I can investigate this further?
Sure, the order number is #123456789. The last tracking update was on June 5th, and it just says 'In transit' without any new details.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted the shipping carrier and they confirmed there is a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to arrive within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update and your quick response. Although it's unfortunate, I understand the delay given the situation.
We have now resolved your inquiry by confirming the expected delivery window. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm if your order has arrived as expected and if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, my package arrived yesterday and everything is perfect. Thanks again for your help and support!
We are glad your delivery issue was resolved. The case is now closed. Have a great day!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the support you received.
